item.title: Prettyfy Powershell
item.description:
A shell üêö has to be pretty üíê. Look at: PowerShell + ConEmu It’s brighter ‚òÄÔ∏è
Look at: PowerShell + Windows Terminal Oh, sparks ‚ú®
The Overview Whether bright or sparks, it is up to you to decide based on your taste. Both ConEmu and Windows Terminal are shells operating on top of PowerShell. Here is what we will do, Setup a Terminal/Shell Configure Powershell: Colors + Fonts (PowerLine) Add Splash ASCII art Add some alias Setup the terminal I am using PowerShell’s latest release-rc-2 and using chocolatey to manage all my package.

item.title: Powershell Tips
item.description: Command Line i.e cmd.exe are still in use in the today system, largely because there are deep entanglements of batch processes in the legacy (old) system. PowerShell is coming offering much more of the old command line in a more standard way. With standardization, it can provide homogeneity and best practices for the advanced user. For me, these 2 things are big, Piping, for output redirection Alias, for make it Linux like commands We can get the recent version from PowerShell’s Github release page.
